text: Hagi vugotama hurmantenesimofona agorga nemanita, ke'zamia amage anteho. Na'ankure zamagra tamagri tamagu'are kegava nehu'za, henkama Anumzamofo refako huzampina tamagri tamagenkema hu'ama hanaza vahe mani'naze. Hagi ana eri'zama erisazana zamatrenke'za musezampinti e'neri'za zamata e'oriho, na'ankure ana zamo'a tamaza osugahie.
